_header: Yet shall Danes these wains [Ȝet shull Danos þes wanes]
_description: Threat and counterthreat in A.D. 1367 in the Brut Chronicle — one couplet

CamCCC174.Transcription:
Ȝet shull danos þes wanesHer shull danes fett
                    banes
CamCCC174.Note:
Also in other MSS of Brut chronicle, near end of chapter
                    232.
